cards.title: Tweet 2 Poem
cards.name: Tweet2Poem
cards.description: A web app that takes a tweet and turns it into a poem

cards.title: Chit Chat
cards.name: ChitChat
cards.description: Genereate a conversation starter with this app, based on location, tone, age and other attributes.

cards.title: Twitter History Bot
cards.name: TwitterHistoryBot
cards.description: A bot that posts interesting history facts and images each day.

cards.title: Simple Bingo Caller
cards.name: SimpleBingoCaller
cards.description: This app helps elderly play bingo in care facilities. It displays the ball in large and calls the number in multiple languages

cards.title: Simple Hangman
cards.name: SimpleHangman
cards.description: An educational word game that is easy to use and fun to play.

cards.title: Loan tracking system
cards.name: LoanTrackingSystem
cards.description: This system helped the lender track loans, syndicator investments, sales commission and many other loan variables. Particular attention was payed to ease of use, compatibilty with accounting software & security.

cards.title: Games 4 Life
cards.name: Games4Life
cards.description: Games for elders that are designed so that they can understand and participate.Reached 100s of seniors with over 30 nursing home customers.
